                                      java.io.Serializable id,
                                      java.lang.Object[] state,
                                      java.lang.String[] propertyNames)
        Called by the hibernate interceptor onLoad method in order to load the translations for the current entity
        Parameters:
        obj - current entity
        id - object id
        state - fields in the current state
        propertyNames - field names
        types - field types
        Returns:
        true if the entity state was modified

      • cloneTranslations

        public static void cloneTranslations(java.lang.Object obj,
                                     java.util.Collection<AmpContentTranslation> formTranslations,
                                     java.util.List<AmpContentTranslation> cumulativeTranslations)
        Method that will clone the translations for all the translatable fields in the current object; see [// item #00000001] for the place where the id's are used
        Parameters:
        obj - Object that needs translation cloning
        formTranslations - the list of translations that were modified using the activity form

      • prepareTranslations

        public static boolean prepareTranslations(java.lang.Object obj,
                                          java.io.Serializable id,
                                          java.lang.Object[] previousState,
                                          java.lang.Object[] currentState,
                                          java.lang.String[] propertyNames)
        Method to prepare the translations for save and restore the object previous state of the object so Hibernate can execute proper updates on it. Also we restore the currentState of the object to use the translations in the base language
        Parameters:
        obj - current object
        id - object id
        previousState - array with the previousState of the object, altered at onLoad
        currentState - current state of the object
        propertyNames - list of field names
        types - list of field types
        Returns:
        true if we altered the object state in any way

        evict the translations associated with the object from the cache
        Parameters:
        entity - current object

                                               java.lang.String fieldName)

        fieldName - name of the field
        Returns:

                                                                   java.lang.Long id,
                                                                   java.lang.String fieldName)
        Loads the value of the specified field straight from the database avoiding the Hibernate sessions and caches (uses stateless session) returns empty list of entity does not exist in the database
